p: Using all samples, a comparison of indirect ELISA to nested PCR as the gold standard revealed its sensitivity and specificity to be 63.8% (95% C.I. 54.4–72.5%) and 89.7% (95% C.I. 78.8–86.1%) respectively (Table 2). A kappa value of 0.47 was obtained which revealed moderate agreement between these two tests.
